scene: Teen Byte in ecstatic morning mood at desk with trophy shelf, plant, and food bowl in golden morning light

subjects.description: Byte in teen stage form with gangly proportions, awkward limbs, and big expressive eyes showing pure happiness
subjects.position: centered at desk, upright posture with confident energetic stance
subjects.action: sitting alert and engaged at the oversized laptop, eyes bright with excitement

subjects.description: wooden trophy shelf mounted on wall above desk with exactly one golden 10-day trophy positioned on the left side and exactly one small green leafy plant on the right side, clear space between them
subjects.position: wall space directly above the desk

simple round food bowl with kibble on the floor to the right side of the desk
simple room with Chicago skyline visible through window showing morning cityscape
